captions.text: Hi, how are you doing?! My name is Otário (Sucker)!
After my interview in the TV show "The Noite", with Danilo Gentili,
where we talked about many serious issues,

such as: cars prices, banking fees, the civil rights framework, 
security in the ballot boxes...
censorship and so on...
To my surprise, what reverberated more in the interviews' comments
was my affirmation of the production cost of each video of Canal do Otário (Sucker's Channel)
be superior than 10 thousand reais.

I really can't understand why this generated
so much reverberation...

Therefore, each “little video” I produce, it's necessary more than
400 hours of work!
And that's only manpower...
I am not considering hardware, software, among other things

And you may thing that I spent a lot of time editing the video,
but it's not like that
 
0:00:54.360,0:00:58.000
'Cause more than 200 hours are spent just in researches
and about 50 hours creating the script.
But the funny was seeing people claiming that could produce better and
cheaper videos than the ones I do!
So, I decided to throw the next challenge:
Espertão Ganha Milão! (Smartass Wins A Thousand)
Works like this:
If you think you can produce Sucker's Channel's videos
with an equal image quality or superior information cheaply!
So, just send me this video ;-)

If I like it, I'll post the video in my main channel 
and even pay you R$1000 for it!
Remembering that this's not a lottery!
If you send me a video and I like it, YOU WIN!
You don't need to register...

subscribe to my channel or much less pay anything to 
participate in this challenge.
Simple like that ;-)
Wow, that's easy, huh "bro"?!

A thousand to make a “little video”
to Canal do Otário! Piece of cake, huh?!
But take it easy, 'cause that's not all!
If you can produce 1 video/week, and I like them all...
You'll get 4 thousand reais in the month!
Not even on Telexfree, you would win money so easy like that ;-)
Wooow, that's cooool!
So?! What are you waiting for to send me your video?!
What?! You want more?!
The first person to have a video posted here in my channel
will receive a bonus of 1000 reais!
Yeah, Yeah, Yeah! Want more?!
If I really like your video, I insist on meeting you in person,
anywhere in the planet that you are...
You liked it?! Easy, cause there's more... much more!
If I publish the four videos in my channel,
the Canal do Otário is yours!
No, you didn't get it wrong...
You'll be the owner of Canal do Otário and I will work for you...
But, of course, only if you accept me in your squad, huh?!
Therefore, a person so badass like that...
I don't know if this person would accept to work with a random Sucker like me ;-)
What?! Don't know where to start?!
Easy, 'cause I will further facilitate your life...
Check these videos I'm showing you in the screen
Where I made some tutorials showing the technics I use to research
and even some special effects used here on Canal do Otário ;-)
Just click and learn!
Now, there's no excuse to not participate
You liked?! SO hit the Like button, share...
'cause if this challenge works... everybody wins...

the scoundrels, that can win money producing
a “little video” for Canal do Otário

I, I will be the main beneficiary, after all, I'll
spend 10 times less than I do today,

and I will have the pleasure of watching this project
really moving forward!

and the fans of Canal do Otário, that will have a lot
of videos with quality and content to watch!
Cool, huh?!

And observe that this isn't the 1st time that I throw this
challenge, in the end of 2013 I made something

similar... but until today I didn't receive
any "little video"!

Yeha... to those people that don't have the
slightest idea of how they thrown their (dirty) cloth

in the bathroom's floor, last week, it appeared clean, 
and folded inside your drawer...
It gets a little tricky to measure someone else's work...
I'm waiting the video, ok? Don't fuck with me!
Buh
[== Translation - Vitor Utrila ==]
